name: Narthan Academy of Dance And  Music
briefDescription: NADAM - An acronym for Narthan Academy for Dance and Music was formally launched by Nandini Mehta & K Muralimohan in 1999. Since its inception, it has witnessed a rise in its popularity in leaps and bounds.The company has its own performing unit specializing in classical and folk forms of India. To create awareness and instill a sense of appreciation towards the performing arts in the present generation, NADAM also delivers lecture demonstrations. They have performed extensively in many prestigious festivals in India, US, Switzerland, France and the Middle East.
